Tom Emerson wrote:

>When a job is paused and all its active threads are complete, can I
>shutdown the crawler and resume the job on another Heritrix instance?
>
>  
>
I don't think that works Tom (Others can say for sure).  You might 
shutdown the job and then use the recover facility to get back to 
approximately the same state (See 
http://crawler.archive.org/articles/user_manual.html#recover).
St.Ack
